```{r load corpus, include=FALSE}
l_star_h_types = c("^[L*]H", "L*H", "L*^[H]", "^[L*H]")

# Load Corpus
m_corpus <- get_m_corpus("../data/m_corpus.csv")  %>%
  # Select only columns for analysis
  select(
    speaker,
    gender,
    mode,
    prompt,
    acc_phon,
    fin_phon,
    h_f0) %>% 
  filter(acc_phon %in% l_star_h_types)  %>% 
  mutate(acc_phon = factor(acc_phon,
                           levels = l_star_h_types)
         )
```

- Full model works with bobyqa optimizer
- isSingular = False @ tol = 1e-5
- Removing prompt for parity with l_f0 model

#### `h_f0 ~ mode + (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | gender)`

```{r run initial model,  fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}
# run model
h_f0_model <- lmer(
  h_f0 ~ 
    mode + (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | gender),
       data = m_corpus,
        control = lmerControl(
          optimizer = "bobyqa")
      )

summariseLME(h_f0_model, run_step = FALSE,
              write = "../output_model_anovas/Mode_h_f0_anova.csv")
#              
```

```{r make tidy model, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE, results="asis"}

h_f0_model.tidy <- analyseModel(h_f0_model,
                                write_r2="../output/Mode_h_f0"
                                )
h_f0_model.tidy$r2

```

```{r do pairwise analysis, fig.height=3, fig.width=9, tidy = TRUE}

charts <- getModelFixedFX(
  my_equation =
    h_f0 ~ mode +
    (1 + mode | speaker) + (1 | fin_phon) + (1 | gender),
  my_data = m_corpus,
  optimizer = "bobyqa",
  write="../output/Mode_h_f0"
)
charts$intercepts
charts$slopes


```
